title: Entering Toilet Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Entering Toilet Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Entering Toilet Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 10
items.arabic: ([بِسْمِ اللَّهِ] اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبائِث).
items.transliteration: (Bismil-lah) allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba-ith.
items.translation: (In the name of Allah).  O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء دخول الخلاء
